name: School Uniform
description: The official attire for the school which is usually a shirt, pants/skirt, and a tie.

name: Textbooks
description: Required reading and reference materials for the courses being taken

name: Stationery
description: Writing materials such as pencils, pens, erasers, rulers, and sharpeners.

name: Backpack
description: A bag for carrying textbooks, stationery, and other school supplies.

name: Lunchbox
description: A container for carrying lunch to school.

name: School Shoes
description: A pair of comfortable shoes that are suitable for school.

name: Sportswear
description: Athletic clothing and shoes that are needed for physical education classes and sports teams.

name: Calculator
description: A tool for performing mathematical calculations.

name: Art Supplies
description: Materials such as paints, brushes, and canvas for art classes.

name: Music Supplies
description: Instruments and sheet music for music classes.

name: Science Equipment
description: Materials for conducting experiments in science classes, such as beakers and test tubes.

name: Scientific Calculator
description: A calculator designed for scientific and engineering calculations.

name: Internet Connection
description: A reliable internet connection for online classes and research.

name: Sports Team Fees
description: The fees for joining a school sports team.

name: Computer
description: A laptop or desktop computer for schoolwork.

name: Club Fees
description: The fees for joining a school club such as debate club or chess club.

name: Graduation Fees
description: The fees for graduation ceremonies such as cap and gown rentals

name: Online Course Subscription
description: A subscription to an online course provider such as Coursera or Udemy.

name: Headphones
description: A set of earphones for listening to audio content in class.

name: Glue
description: Glue is an adhesive substance used for sticking things together. It can be used to repair or create various school items such as notebooks, folders, and artwork. Glue comes in various forms such as liquid, stick, or gel.
